Name: ORBITAL
About the game: The game is a simple but exciting arcade. You have to control the satellite, one of the few planets in the solar system. Destroying enemies you get points, thereby to set new records! #Nice graphics #Good soundtrack #Simple but addictive gameplay The game is perfect after a hard day!
